text: The Ruben M. Torres Unit is a state prison for men located in Hondo, Medina County, Texas, owned by operated by the Texas Department of Criminal Justice. This facility was opened in January 1993, and a maximum capacity of 1384 male inmates held at various security levels. ==References== Category:Prisons in Texas Category:Buildings and structures in Medina County, Texas Category:1993 establishments in Texas
title: Ruben M. Torres Unit
